trans-unit.source: A class that allows <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.IWorkflowInstanceExtensions> extensions access to the workflow service host.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que permite <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.IWorkflowInstanceExtensions>acesso de extensões para o host de serviço de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.IWorkflowInstanceExtensions>

trans-unit.source: Resumes a workflow from a bookmark asynchronously using the specified bookmark, value, callback method, and user-provided state data.
trans-unit.target: Retome um fluxo de trabalho de um indicador de forma assíncrona usando o indicador especificado, valor, o método de retorno de chamada e os dados de estado fornecido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: To determine if the resume operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se a operação de retomada foi bem-sucedida, chame <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the callback method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>pode ser chamado de dentro ou fora do método de retorno de chamada.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>é chamado antes de concluir a operação de retomada, ele bloqueia até a conclusão da operação de retomada.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: The bookmark.
trans-unit.target: O indicador.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem passados para a atividade que criou o indicador.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the asynchronous resume operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: O método a ser chamado quando a operação de retomada assíncrona for concluída.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto específico do aplicativo opcional que contém informações sobre a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Resumes a workflow from a bookmark asynchronously using the specified bookmark, value, time-out interval, callback method, and user-provided state.
trans-unit.target: Retome um fluxo de trabalho de um indicador de forma assíncrona usando o indicador especificado, o valor, o intervalo de tempo limite, o método de retorno de chamada e o estado fornecido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: To determine if the resume operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se a operação de retomada foi bem-sucedida, chame <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the callback method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>pode ser chamado de dentro ou fora do método de retorno de chamada.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>é chamado antes de concluir a operação de retomada, ele bloqueia até a conclusão da operação de retomada.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a operação de retomada deve ser concluído em 30 segundos ou um que <xref:System.TimeoutException>é gerada a partir de <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> </xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The bookmark.
trans-unit.target: O indicador.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem passados para a atividade que criou o indicador.

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the resume operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo no qual a operação de retomada deve concluir antes da operação será cancelada e um <xref:System.TimeoutException>é gerada.</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the resume operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: O método a ser chamado quando a operação de retomada foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto específico do aplicativo opcional que contém informações sobre a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Waits for the pending asynchronous <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.BeginResumeBookmark*> to complete.
trans-unit.target: Aguarda o pendentes assíncronas <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.BeginResumeBookmark*>para concluir.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.BeginResumeBookmark*>

trans-unit.source: This method can be called to determine whether a <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.BeginResumeBookmark%2A> operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser chamado para determinar se um <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.BeginResumeBookmark%2A>a operação foi bem-sucedida.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.BeginResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: If called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Se for chamado antes de concluir a operação de retomada, ele bloqueia até que a operação de retomada seja concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the resume operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que faz referência a operação de retomada.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow instance ID.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ID da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance ID.
trans-unit.target: A ID de instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a definição de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: A definição de fluxo de trabalho.
